MAN.TITLE: rowcomp

DESCRIPTION.P: Row compression of A. Ac = W*A is a row compressed matrix: i.e. Ac=[Af;0] with Af full row rank.
flag and tol are optional parameters: flag='qr' or 'svd' (default 'svd').
tol is a tolerance parameter (of order sqrt(%eps) as default value).
The rk first columns of W' span the range of A.
The rk first (top) rows of W span the row range of A.

ITEMIZE.label: Remark
ITEMIZE.P: A non zero vector x belongs to range(A) iff W*x is row compressed in accordance with Ac i.e the norm of its last components is small w.r.t its first components.

MAN.EXAMPLE: A=rand(5,2)*rand(2,4); // 4 col. vectors, 2 independent. [X,dim]=rowcomp(A);Xp=X'; svd([Xp(:,1:dim),A]) //span(A) = span(Xp(:,1:dim) x=A*rand(4,1); //x belongs to span(A) y=X*x norm(y(dim+1:$))/norm(y(1:dim)) // small
MAN.AUTHOR: F. D.; ;
